sub_topic: Probability of rolling a certain number on a dice
message_1: What is the probability of rolling a 3 on a fair six-sided dice?
message_2: The probability of rolling a 3 on a fair six-sided dice is 1/6 or approximately 0.1667 (rounded to four decimal places), since there is one favorable outcome (rolling a 3) out of six possible outcomes (rolling a 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6).
